text: Beverley Jane McEwan (n√©e Moxon; previously Atkinson, Sowden and Callard; born 28 March 1957) is an English actress, known for her roles as Liz McDonald in the long-running ITV soap opera Coronation Street and Flo Henshaw in the BBC sitcom Two Pints of Lager and a Packet for Crisps. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Leeds Category:Actors from Yorkshire
title: Beverley Callard
